channel.title: Need a good coder to fix this error in a new source i downloaded
channel.description: what the error is ...is that when i get killed it crash's silab client and sighn's me out when i look on the run.bat it says [code]Game saved for player "playername" ClientHandler: Client "playername" disconnected.[/code] now i dont understand where the clienthandler comes from because i cannot find it sooo..... i dont no if you can tell me how to fix it whithout lookin at the source but if you cant here is download link for it [url=http://uppit.com/6JK05G]http://uppit.com/6JK05G[/url] Help will be extreamerly appreciated as this is the only base i have found that i liked
